description: The function does not validate or sanitize the input properly which can lead to various types of attacks such as SQL Injection, XSS, etc. (CWE-20). The function also exposes sensitive information about the internal workings of the application which can be used by an attacker to exploit the system (CWE-200). The function does not limit the amount of resources it consumes which can lead to a Denial of Service attack (CWE-400).
